id: theblaze--2019-07-29--Report said police in Arizona town would be pulling innocent people over for following traffic laws
title: Report said police in Arizona town would be pulling innocent people over for following traffic laws — and people were not happy
content:
Report said police in Arizona town would be pulling innocent people over for following traffic laws — and people were not happy

Police had to clarify after confusion about "Positive Ticketing Campaign."
author: Chris Pandolfo
